reviewText: This is by far the best filmed African hunting video I've ever seen.  The HD quality filming, sound quality, and editing is the best.  I wish I could give it 6 stars.  I can't wait for another video from these guys.  (The sable they hunt is a trophy of a lifetime!)  Very intense hunting to say the least.  If you like hunting deep Africa, this video is a Must!

This is a very well produced hunting video that bears up under repeated viewing. The elephant hunting and leopard scenes are particularly fine. A nasty leopard bite and clawing at the sharp end. That had to hurt, especially after the adrenaline wore off. Highly recommended!
